### Sample-to-sample distances

```{r sts, fig.width=10, fig.height=6, echo=FALSE}

sample_dists <- dist(t(assay(rld)))
sample_dist_matrix <- as.matrix(sample_dists)
rownames(sample_dist_matrix) <- rownames(colData(rld))
colnames(sample_dist_matrix) <- rownames(colData(rld))

annot_df <- colData(dds) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  dplyr::select(matches(annotation_heatmap))

heatmaply(sample_dist_matrix,
  xlab = "Samples",
  ylab = "Samples",
  k_row = NA,
  k_col = NA,
  seriate = "OLO",
  plot_method = "plotly",
  row_side_colors = annot_df,
  col_side_colors = annot_df,
  symm = TRUE
)
```
